title: 09 - Cynicism vs. Delight
description:
Cynicism is the air we breathe and we don’t even notice it. We’ll ask ourselves some questions to see if we struggle with cynical thoughts! There’s a more joyful, more delightful way to live. When we’re cynical, we don’t see our need to be helped! The tool God has given us to fight this is simple. Let’s fight for each other today!

Tickets for the Get Out Of Your Head Tour with me, Jefferson Bethke, and Davy Flowers are available now! http://www.getoutofyourheadtour.com

Get Out of Your Head book: getoutofyourheadbook.com

A Gospel-centered, seriously fun summer camp for your kids: https://pine.co.ve/Jennie_4

Check out this Spotify playlist of symphonies: https://open.spotify.com/playlist/1LNekOIC58z7InABeRzhJv?si=ZR0ef0H5S-mcK52INsHqVg
